name: Firedamp
description:
A firedamp accident has just happened, and you leave before it's too late! Increasing into a big one-room mine, while you try exiting from the old factory and to escape to outside!

Walk Left / RightA / DWalk Up / DownW / SAttackSpace

Created for The Indie Tales Jam by JaKayne (programmer) and marinho (art).
